SEARCH
Package cocoa.common

Class R<T>

java.lang.Object
cocoa.common.R<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of data to be returned in the response.
public class R<T> extends Object
A generic response wrapper class for standardizing API responses.

  • Constructor Details

    • R

      public R()

  • Method Details

    • success

      public static <T> R<T> success(T object)
      Creates a success response.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the data.
      Parameters:
      object - The data to include in the response.
      Returns:
      An instance of R<T> with a success code, message, and the provided data.

    • error

      public static <T> R<T> error(String msg)
      Creates an error response.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the data (null in error cases).
      Parameters:
      msg - A message describing the error.
      Returns:
      An instance of R<T> with an error code and message.

    • add

      public R<T> add(String key, Object value)
      Adds a dynamic key-value pair to the response map. This allows for adding extra data to the response without modifying the main structure.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the data.
      value - The value associated with the key.
      Returns:
      The current instance of R<T>, enabling method chaining.
